name: Hauling Away
description:
Without aim... Without destination...


Alone and stuck in job that he has no passion for, protagonist Ray slowly wastes away his days working as a "Hauler".
Despite being fed up with the status quo, he has seemingly resigned himself to accepting his life as it is.

But unbeknownst to him, his next journey might change his life forever.
Will the future hold disaster or salvation? ...or perhaps, a bit of both?

Features


  • ~1 hour of Visual Novel gameplay
  • A bittersweet story revolving around ambitions and loneliness.
  • Original art and soundtrack
  • A unique, but loving waifu
